FuncDef:
The statistic enable mode command enables statistics collection on an Layer 2 sub-interface.
The undo statistic enable mode command disables statistics collection from an Layer 2 sub-interface.
By default, the traffic statistics collection function is disabled on a sub-interface.

ParaDef.Info:
Indicates the single mode, in which statistics are collected based on a specific  Layer 2 sub-interface.
-

Indicates the multiple mode in which statistics are collected based on sub-interface+VLAN tag. Either a single VLAN tag or both an inner VLAN tag and an outer VLAN tag can be specified.
-

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
To collect the number of packets that an Layer 2 sub-interface forwards, run the statistic enable mode command.
